name: International Cooperation Center
goal: Establishing a Center which will offer all possible services and supports, such as, research, network, exposure tours, publications, seminars/conferences/workshops, etc. to help develop mutual understanding and collaboration between nations and/or relevant multi-national agencies in the region.
interests: Development, Education, Enlargement, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence
euInitiatives: Eastern Partnership Program, Euronest PA, the OSCE PA policies
